channel.title: Lostisland-rsps.org || Dedicated VPS and Hiscores || Longterm
channel.description:
[b]@Ruby: This is not a repost, I edited things and the other one is locked anyways :P, thanks[/b]
[center][IMG]http://lostisland-rsps.org/images/banner2.png[/img][/center]
[size=3][url=http://www.lostisland-rsps.org]Click here[/url] to play now [url=http://www.lostisland-rsps.org/oldschool/hiscores/overall.php]Click here[/url] to view the hiscores [url=http://www.lostisland-rsps.org/guides/guides.php]Click here[/url] to view the skill guides[/size][/center]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/qoczyv.png[/img]
VPS STATS:
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/358289z.png[/img]
[HR]
I'm not going to bore your mind here by telling you that this server has perfect timers, perfect skilling, perfect this, peftect that. You've seen all that stuff before, but I will ask you to take a small 2 minutes of your day so I can have the opportunity to present you my efforts that I put into this server. [b]Please take the time to read carefully, or to visit the website/hiscores before commenting on this post[/b]
For starters, I want to remind you that this server is specifically UNIQUE. Now your probably thinking, oh yes, like every other server...but keep reading
[b]Caution:[/b] This is not a server where you login with a starter and have simply buy your 99 magic. The shops are very limited, items must be generated through skilling and npc drops, simply buying essential items from shops would demotivate the players to actually train their skills (apart from ranks in the hiscores)
[HR][/HR]
We actually have players: (Not as big as one of the top servers, but decent)
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/hwjx4l.png[/img]
[HR][/HR]
1. [b]The Achievement Skill:[/b]
The achievement skill can be level'd up by simply clicking on it and following the instructions.
[u]Example:[/u]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/21nkvvl.png[/img]
The achievement level gives you certain privileges that can help you on the server, ::ach brings up the privilege screen:
[u]Rewards from leveling up the [b]Achievement Skill:[/b][/u]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/11wbl8x.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/z0qbt.png[/img]
[HR][/HR]
The other skills can also be trained, but like I said, this server is UNIQUE. The skills are not the same as they would be in a typical server. Of course, fletching is used to make bows and arrows, but it's not like runescape.
This is how fletching goes, you get your logs from woodcutting (nothing unique yet), then you can examine the logs to see what items are to be yielded when fletched.
[u]Example of examining logs[/u]:
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/qnwivp.png[/img]
[HR][/HR]
Ok, so I'm not going to explain to you about every skill in detail, so I'm just going to throw some media below so you can visually see the various skills throughout Lost Island.
[u]Slayer xp obtained from killing npc's in the slayer tower. (No more tasks, kill what you want)[/u]
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2ry252r.png[/img]
[u]When a rare drop is looted from a player, it is yelled out throughout the server for others to see![/u]
[img]http://i47.tinypic.com/11r7oye.png[/img]
[u]Treasure trials are coded and can be solved for rares.[/u]
Guide to possible rares from clues (including treasure trail items):
[ul][li][b]Easy Clue:[/b] Santa, robin, ranger boots, easter egg, pumpkin[/li] [li][b]Medium Clue:[/b] Masks, headbands, pirate hats[/li] [li][b]Hard Clue:[/b] Purple Phat, Bunny ears, scythe[/li] [li][b]Elite Clue:[/b] All phats[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/35ciqds.png[/img]
[u]Example of smithing[/u]
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2079gme.png[/img]
[HR][/HR]
Here are some custom items (no, they are not shitty re-colored items, they have each a description when examined and are proved to be very useful and enjoyable to use)
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/xb9xly.png[/img]
[HR][/HR]
[b]The hiscores: Fully functional hiscores for you and your friends to fight for number 1 rank![/b]
[url=http://www.lostisland-rsps.org/hiscores/overall.php]Click here[/url] to view the hiscores
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/33c6744.png[/img]
[HR][/HR]
[u]Skill guides on the site: [url=http://www.lostisland-rsps.org/guides/guides.php]Click here[/url][/u]
[u]Preview:[/u]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/345eq8g.png[/img]
So I guess that's all I have for now. I'll be updating the topic frequently and I hope to see new players join!
Take it easy ~ Smitty
If you have any suggestions for the website, hiscores, or the game itself...just log in the game and ::yell [suggestion]. I do take in consideration what the people say, and I always favor a players suggestion versus one who hasn't joined at all.
[center][size=6][url=http://www.lostisland-rsps.org]Click here[/url] to play now [url=http://www.lostisland-rsps.org/oldschool/hiscores/overall.php]Click here[/url] to view the hiscores [url=http://www.lostisland-rsps.org/guides/guides.php]Click here[/url] to view the skill guides[/size][/center]

item.description:
@shaun123430 wrote:

I remember playing the old version of this, was loads of fun. Got on now, still lots of fun and around 20 people on. You guys should come check it out.

Read full topic

item.title: Lostisland-rsps.org || Dedicated VPS and Hiscores || Longterm
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Was on this a few days ago, great server but the achievement skill was incredibly underdeveloped to even be worth mentioning in a server thread. Keep up the good work though.

Read full topic
item.source: Lostisland-rsps.org || Dedicated VPS and Hiscores || Longterm

item.description:
@smittyy wrote:

@Ruby: This is not a repost, I edited things and the other one is locked anyways :P, thanks

[center][/center]

[size=3]Click here to play now
Click here to view the hiscores
Click here to view the skill guides[/size][/center]

qoczyv.png927×82

VPS STATS:

358289z.png699×382

[HR]

I’m not going to bore your mind here by telling you that this server has perfect timers, perfect skilling, perfect this, peftect that. You’ve seen all that stuff before, but I will ask you to take a small 2 minutes of your day so I can have the opportunity to present you my efforts that I put into this server.
Please take the time to read carefully, or to visit the website/hiscores before commenting on this post

For starters, I want to remind you that this server is specifically UNIQUE. Now your probably thinking, oh yes, like every other server…but keep reading

Caution: This is not a server where you login with a starter and have simply buy your 99 magic. The shops are
very limited, items must be generated through skilling and npc drops, simply buying essential items from shops would demotivate the players to
actually train their skills (apart from ranks in the hiscores)

[HR][/HR]

We actually have players: (Not as big as one of the top servers, but decent)

hwjx4l.png768×501

[HR][/HR]

  1. The Achievement Skill:

The achievement skill can be level’d up by simply clicking on it and following the instructions.

Example:

21nkvvl.png767×166

The achievement level gives you certain privileges that can help you on the server, ::ach brings up the privilege screen:

Rewards from leveling up the Achievement Skill:


[HR][/HR]

The other skills can also be trained, but like I said, this server is UNIQUE. The skills are not the same as they
would be in a typical server. Of course, fletching is used to make bows and arrows, but it’s not like runescape.

This is how fletching goes, you get your logs from woodcutting (nothing unique yet), then you can examine the
logs to see what items are to be yielded when fletched.

Example of examining logs:

qnwivp.png930×343

[HR][/HR]

Ok, so I’m not going to explain to you about every skill in detail, so I’m just going to throw some media below so you
can visually see the various skills throughout Lost Island.

Slayer xp obtained from killing npc’s in the slayer tower. (No more tasks, kill what you want)

When a rare drop is looted from a player, it is yelled out throughout the server for others to see!

Treasure trials are coded and can be solved for rares.

Guide to possible rares from clues (including treasure trail items):

[ul][li]Easy Clue: Santa, robin, ranger boots, easter egg, pumpkin[/li]
[li]Medium Clue: Masks, headbands, pirate hats[/li]
[li]Hard Clue: Purple Phat, Bunny ears, scythe[/li]
[li]Elite Clue: All phats[/li][/ul]

Example of smithing

2079gme.png524×655

[HR][/HR]

Here are some custom items (no, they are not shitty re-colored items, they have each a description when examined
and are proved to be very useful and enjoyable to use)

xb9xly.png745×464

[HR][/HR]

The hiscores: Fully functional hiscores for you and your friends to fight for number 1 rank!

Click here to view the hiscores

33c6744.png901×651

[HR][/HR]

Skill guides on the site: Click here

Preview:

345eq8g.png1106×588

So I guess that’s all I have for now. I’ll be updating the topic frequently and I hope to see new players join!

Take it easy ~ Smitty

If you have any suggestions for the website, hiscores, or the game itself…just log in the game and ::yell [suggestion]. I do take in consideration what the people say, and I always favor a players suggestion versus one who hasn’t joined at all.

Click here to view the hiscores
Click here to view the skill guides[/size][/center]
